member.name: M:kCura.Notification.Config.#ctor(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Constructs a new configuration object that pulls its configuration values from the provided dictionary.
member.param: The dictionary to pull configuration values from
member.remarks: This constructor is for tests that want to avoid pulling configuration values from the database

member.name: P:kCura.Notification.Config.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton instance of the configuration class.

member.name: M:kCura.Notification.Email.#ctor(kCura.Notification.Config,kCura.Notification.SmtpClientWrapperFactory)
member.summary: Constructs a new email mailer that pulls its configuration values from the provided instead of the default.
member.param: The object to pull configuration settings from
The to use when creating new SmtpClients
